song_lyrics: Chitta vyavahārmā kadi dīdhu naī... Swāmī 1
Guru āgnāe gṛuh tajī nisare... Swāmī 2
Pramukh padavī nānī vaye ja līdhī... Swāmī 3
Vahāle banāvī santo dharma vṛuddhi karī,
Karāvī shāstro ne vṛuṣh vṛuṣhṭi karī,
Rachāvī mandiro upāsanā shuddha karī... Swāmī 5
Vahāle vishva samaste satat je vicharī,
Bhogī mastī Prabhunī ne bhogāvī... Swāmī 7
title: Swāmī Nārāyaṇswarūp vichare jage

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1106: Sadhu Bhaktipriyadas

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
